article_title: Oxford Uni academics launch a tracker for COVID-19 policy interventions
article_description: Oxford University academics have launched a project to track government responses to the coronavirus pandemic  The tool  called the Oxford COVID 19 Government Response Tracker  OxCG   tracks 11 indicators to generate an index that compares the stringency of
